title: Boris Chukhlov
text:
Boris Vladimirovich Chukhlov (; born October 26, 1960 in <a href="Leningrad">Leningrad</a>, now St. Petersburg) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player.
European club competitions.
With <a href="FC%20Zenit%20Leningrad">FC Zenit Leningrad</a>.
